item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Fix language parser failing to recognize language type in yml files due to indentation * Incrase width and height of custom patch window * Allow CWTools to report proper lines in invalid definitions section by performing any code stripping after CWTools processing * Big improvements to advanced merge (is slower but more accurate) CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8
